Package org.javautil.jdbc.datasources

Class Summary
AbstractDataSource All DatasourceFactory datasources must extend this class.
C3P0Datasource Uses the C3P0 connection pooling library to maintain a connection pool.
ConnectionCacheEntry  
H2InMemoryDataSource Gives access to an in memory singleton H2 database instance.
NonConnectionPooledDatasource Generic class for obtaining a connection, requires a user, password, driver, and a url to be defined within the datasource properties.
ReflectionDataSource All DatasourceFactory datasources must extend this class.
SimpleDatasourcesFactory  
SystemOrEnvironmentDataSourceFactory  
 

Exception Summary
DataSourceInstantiationException  
InvalidDataSourceException
